TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Track extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一個處理 控制項位置和大小的原始控制項，以及兩個用來設定 的 控制項。

span.span: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a control and two controls that are used to set a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項並沒有預設值。The control does not have a default . 其實作的一部分的和控制項。Its is implemented as part of the of the and controls. 已經控制項及兩個控制項，用來變更屬性控制項。The has a control and two controls that are used to change the property of the control. 下圖顯示滑桿上。The following illustration shows a on a slider. **滑桿上的追蹤A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton、 縮圖](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 縮圖")![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") 下表顯示屬性和對應自動繫結到的屬性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties that they automatically bind to. 當其中一個屬性變更時，繫結的屬性也會變更。When either property changes, the bound property also changes. | 屬性property| 屬性property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 下表顯示屬性和對應屬性的繫結時屬於控制和屬性未明確設定。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 屬性property| 屬性property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 下表顯示屬性和對應屬性的繫結時屬於控制和屬性未明確設定。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 屬性property| 屬性property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 此外，的屬性控制控制項繫結屬性控制項的控制項。Additionally, the properties for the controls for a control bind with the properties for the controls of the control. 當可用來捲動內容的大小控制成正比的內容，會出現在檢視區的可檢視區域的百分比。When a is used to scroll content, the size of the control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport. 下圖顯示的範例實作控制項控制項。The following illustration shows an example of a control that implements a control. **已追蹤控制項的捲軸A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "捲軸圖例")![ScrollBar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illustration") 下列計算來計算的大小。The following calculation is used to compute the size of the . 縮圖大小 = (viewportSize/(maximum-minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLengththumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum-minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength ViewportSize 參數是值屬性。The viewportSize parameter is the value of the property. 最大和最小值的參數會對應至和屬性值。The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the and property values. 最大值運算式的值-最小 + viewportSize 是可捲動內容的大小。The value of the expression maximum-minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content. 請注意，值屬性代表的當內容捲動至底部。Note that the value of the property represents the of the when the content is scrolled to the bottom. 這值不是相同長度或範圍的內容。This value is not the same as the length or extent of the content. 如需詳細說明，請參閱。For a more detailed explanation, see . 的中增加從上到下或從左到右的方向根據。The of a in a increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 同樣地，的中由下到上或從左到右的方向根據增加。Similarly, the of a in a increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 若要增加值的方向變更，請設定的屬性至`true`。To change the direction of increasing value, set the property of the to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義在中控制可 。The following example shows how to define a control in a . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#TrackDefinition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#trackdefinition)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDirectionReversed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定是否要從預設方向來反轉漸增 的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing is reversed from the default direction.

value.span: 如果而交換的位置，且增加值的方向會反轉，否則為。

span.span: if the and the exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時的值設為`true`，則並中交換上的芳鄰。When the value of is set to `true`, the and the in the exchange places. 值會增加從左到右，這兩個水平和控制項。values increase from left to right for both horizontal and controls. 不過，值是垂直而，增加從頂端到底部，在垂直這些值會增加從下至上。However, the values for a vertical increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical these values increase from bottom to top. 當您設定屬性設`true`，增加值的方向會反轉。When you set the property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses. 如果您實作的一部分控制項，而且您沒有明確設定屬性，屬性繫結至屬性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何屬性定義在內控制項範本時屬性是。The following example shows how the property is defined inside the control template when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Maximum { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Maximum : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 的最大可能 。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible of the .
The largest allowable for the .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項處於控制項並未明確設定屬性，這個屬性會自動繫結與屬性。When a control is in a control and the property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the property. 值控制項相當於減去之可見內容區域的檢視區大小的可捲動內容的大小。The value for a control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport. 例如，如果內容的大小是 100 的大小屬性為 30，值屬性就是 70。For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the property is 30, the value of the property is 70. 這是，則為 true 因為屬性控制項對應中會出現在檢視區上方的可捲動內容的位置。This is true because the property of the control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport. 當內容捲動到 在此範例中的最下面時，百分之 30 的內容仍會出現在檢視區。When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport. 因此，對應至檢視區上方是 70，而值是 70。Therefore, the that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the value is 70. 下圖顯示如何對應中的位置的控制項。The following illustration shows how the corresponds to a position in the of a control. ![值會對應到內容的位置](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "值會對應到內容的位置")![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的繫結來源按鈕會變成屬性。The following example shows how to set the property for a that becomes the binding source for the property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 控制項，其用來變更 的 。

span.span: Gets the control that is used to change the of a .

value.span: 與 搭配使用的 控制項。

span.span: The control that is used with the .

value.span: 預設值是擁有預設設定的 控制項。

span.span: The default is a control that has default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放置控制對應至的控制項。The placement of the control corresponds to the of the control. 大小控制在控制項會反映目前可看見的內容數量。The size of the control in a control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible. 大小控制計算如下：The size of the control of the is computed in the following ways: - 如果未指定屬性，大小是固定的預設值。If the property is not specified, the size of the is a fixed default value. 這是如何的追蹤函式內控制項。This is how the of a Track functions inside a control. - 如果指定屬性和內容的大小大於，使用下列公式：If the property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the , the following formula is used: 縮圖大小 = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / （最大值-最小值 + ViewportSize）ThumbSize = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / (Maximum - Minimum + ViewportSize) 參數定義，如下所示：Where the parameters are defined as follows: ||| |-|-| |ThumbSizeThumbSize|大小TrackLength 為相同的單位中的控制項。The size of the control in the same units as the TrackLength.| |TrackLengthTrackLength|長度。The length of the .| |ViewportSizeViewportSize|可捲動內容的單位，例如文件的頁數 中顯示的區域大小。The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.| |最大值Maximum|內容的單位，例如第 10 頁的 10 頁的文件中的內容最大值。The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.| |最低Minimum|以內容為單位，例如文件的第 1 頁內容的最小的值。The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.| 下圖顯示其中一些參數中的視覺表示法控制項。The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a control. ![檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度")![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length") - 如果內容的大小是小於，則不會出現和屬性設為`false`。If the size of the content is less than a , the does not appear and the property of is set to `false`. 最小值的大小控制項由兩個系統參數，決定和。The minimum sizes for a control are determined by two system parameters, and . 最小控制項的垂直為 1/2 \*和最小大小控制項的水平是 1/2 \* 。The minimum size for a control in a vertical is 1/2 \* and the minimum size for a control in a horizontal is 1/2 \* . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何內定義樣式當屬性是。The following example shows how the style is defined inside the when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ViewportSize : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可見之可捲動內容的部分大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.

value.span: 可捲動內容之可見區域的大小。

span.span: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示未定義內容大小。

span.span: The default is , which means that the content size is not defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性用來計算的大小控制中當不是。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control in a when the is not . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 >屬性。For more information, see the remarks for the property. 若要明確定義的大小，建立物件衍生自類別，並提供覆寫和。To explicitly define the size of the , create an object that derives from the class and provide overrides for and . 如果您實作的一部分控制項，而且您沒有明確設定屬性，屬性繫結至屬性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. 值的屬性控制項中實作控制項一律會，因為控制項不會變更大小。The value of the property of a control that is implemented in a control is always , because the control does not change size. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您指定之子項目的splittunneling ， ，和屬性。You specify the child elements of a by setting the , , and properties. 子項目編製索引的屬性已設定的順序。The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
